FONT_DESCRIPTION: You can use this command to apply a Glow onto the text of a card or to toggle its Gen, Name or Series
ERROR_FINDING_CARD: {{author}} The card code you provided is either invalid or not in your collection
NO_GIF_3D: {{author}} You cannot change the text on **3D** or **GIF** cards
NOT_CARD_OWNER: {{author}} The card code you provided is either invalid or not in your collection
RESET_FOOTER: Reset font: {{fontPrice}} | Reset color: {{colorPrice}} | Reset all: {{allPrice}}
RESET_ALL_DEFAULT: Font style and color are already default
RESET_ALL_NO_AMOUNT: You don't have enough **{{currency}}** to reset the font color and style
RESET_ALL_SUCCESS: Font style and color has been reset
RESET_FONT_NO_AMOUNT: You don't have enough **{{currency}}** to reset the font style
RESET_COLOR_NO_AMOUNT: You don't have enough **{{currency}}** to reset the font color
GLOW_CODE_INVALID: The **Glow** code you provided is either invalid or not in your inventory
NOT_ENOUGH_GEMS: You don't have enough **Gems** to make this purchase
NOT_ENOUGH_SILVERS: You don't have enough **Silver** to make this purchase
